actions.name: Beherition

cost.trigger: At the start of combat, when switched in, or when the user gains this ability.

actions.description:
Trigger: At the start of combat, when switched in, or when the user gains this ability.
Effect: The Weather is changed to Intense Umbra. When the user gains @Affliction[fainted] or switches out the weather will change to Gloomy for 5 rounds.
